lead_paragraph: Two men were fatally shot on Friday in Washington, bringing this year’s homicide count to 105, a more than 40 percent increase over the same period a year ago, the police said.

headline.main: As Homicide Rate Rises, Washington Mayor Pledges Action
headline.print_headline: As Murder Rate Rises, Washington Mayor Vows Action

snippet: Two men were fatally shot on Friday in Washington, bringing this year’s homicide count to 105, a more than 40 percent increase over the same period a year ago, the police said.
